text: Niscaya yara apanara kache ba'iâ€™ata kare [1] tara to allahara'i hate ba'iâ€™ata kare. Allahara hata [2] tadera hatera upara [3]. Tarapara ye ta bhanga kare, ta bhanga karara parinama bartabe tara'i upara ebam ye allahara sathe krta angikara purna kare, tabe tini abasya'i take mahapuraskara dena
